data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Aerosoft - Airport Wilmington
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Wilmington International Airport of the correspondent city Wilmington is located in the southeastern part of North Carolina. With its five non-stop connections you are able to comfortably travel from A to B.

Right from the start Wilmington was exclusively developed for X-Plane 10 and includes all the features X-Plane has to offer. From the samllest of details to the miniture lights to the guy ropes of the power poles.

Features


  • Designed from the ground up for X-Plane 10
  • 15cm per pixel resolution imagery on all tarmacs, taxiways and runways (high-resolution version)
  • Superb HDR lighting
  • Fully detailed rendition of Wilmington Int`l Airport
  • Custom taxiway signs and pavement markings
  • Custom static objects including aircraft
  • High-resolution ground and object textures
  • Perfect for short VATSIM flights
  • Accurately placed, color corrected imagery
  • Lower resolution version included
  • Manual in English and German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
